Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised!”
Reviews.Author: larain26
Reviews.Content: little hesitant book hotel picture outside pleasantly surprised interior hotel current comfortable clean front desk staff friendly helpful restaurant recommendations walking distance attractions restaurants downtown breakfast included nice usual continental selections plus hard boiled eggs yogurt biscuits gravy coffee breakfast largest ive seen multiple seating clean wellstocked guest clean comfortable loved multiple selections pillows success wireless internet didnt local office week covered parking close convenient nice clean comfortable affordable price dont afraid try

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: bucky5860
Reviews.Content: outside hotel looks outdated dont fooled interior updated clean nice town ten basketball tournament location blocks walk bankers life fieldhouse downtown restaurants parking hotel free staff friendly breakfast adequate bed comfortable corner walls windows view downtown drawback slow elevator

Reviews.Title: “Very Friendly & Comfortable Enviorment!!”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a La Quinta traveler
Reviews.Content: start saying cleaness hotel ive stayed front desk rep terrance sweetest hard worker homey loved view downtown love close convention center alot resturants selection breakfast nutritional stay colleagues feel welcome appreciate

Reviews.Author: Rob P
Reviews.Content: nice property located near downtown couple blocks walking neighborhood safe lit night complimentary parking property hotel condition age negative downtown positive doesnt cost downtown hotels save yourself cash stay

Reviews.Content: family enjoyed stay hotel indy nieces gymnastic event happy moment checked staff friendly adjoining requested hotel edge downtown 35 cheaper walking distance map menus nice familiar nice modern beds comfy free breakfast hot items pastries choose parking free bonus hotel 5 blocks convention center 2 minute drive cab service 5 recommend hotel coming

Reviews.Title: “Average facility but nice front desk staff”
Reviews.Author: saber45
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights nov hotel hotwire free parking nice hotel walking distance downtown destination double beds adequate door didnt shut properly shoulder nudge shut closet door didnt shut properly waste time tracks maintenance ill coming indy wont risk hotwire pick

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service”
Reviews.Author: MCE7406
Reviews.Content: checked rep counter outstanding exterior hotel little dont fool rep upgraded reservation blink eye breakfast plenty walking distance lots eat

Reviews.Title: “colts/steelers game”
Reviews.Author: kandvr
Reviews.Content: wife indy 23 times games stayed downtown circle center decided try saved minimum 6070 cost vs downtown 1520 minute walk center town bad weathers nice rained entire time prepared yes elevators hotels stayed indy parking convienent somewhat covered slept monday missed breakfast spacious clean bed comfortable shower nice pressure didnt notice excess noises hallway doors tend slam heavy stay weather decent

Reviews.Content: newly renovated hotel bi tthat renovated elevator layout parking staff ok somewhat dismal breakfast standard below standard location downtown indy parking real especially car special rates pay 70 overpaid internet slow printer business center desktop pc slow internet

Reviews.Title: “Conference Getaway”
Reviews.Author: BookSlinger
Reviews.Content: attended conference indiana convention center stayed laquinta downtown instead westin save money impression la quinta bad rep past life hotel chain little walk convention center invigorating conference sitting wondered hotel practically empty service clean parking free unfortunately vending machines empty wasnt close eat dinner staff takeout menus breakfast bar ive seen chain motel customer deal nights sleep

Reviews.Content: hotel newly renovated please ignore previous reviews flat panel tv leather chair comfortable bed staff location downtown price 40 hotels close im indianapolis im staying
